Shortbread app is powered by an AI Comics Studio. Our AI tech enables pro artists to create comics at 1/10 the traditional cost and at higher quality. Our stories are written by bestselling writers on BookTok, Kindle, and Wattpad.

**Company Overview: Shortbread**

Shortbread is a fresh entrant in the world of comics, and it’s not your usual comic publisher. Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator's W23 batch, Shortbread started as an app, often dubbed the "Netflix for bite-sized mobile comics." At its core, the mission of Shortbread is simple yet ambitious: to make reading romance comics more accessible and enjoyable.

**How It Works**

With a subscription, users can access premium romance series that are delivered in a bite-sized format — perfect for those short stints of free time we all have. The app not only caters to the readers but also empowers creators. Their innovative AI Comics Studio significantly reduces the cost of comic production — up to ten times cheaper than traditional methods — while maintaining high quality. This means that both established and emerging artists can bring their stories to life.

The stories are penned by bestselling authors from popular platforms like BookTok, Kindle, and Wattpad, ensuring that the content is engaging and resonates with the audience.

**Team and Location**

Nestled in the vibrant tech hub of San Francisco, Shortbread operates with a lean team of five dedicated employees. Diana Hu serves as their Group Partner, likely aiding in steering the company's vision. 

**Diverse Offerings**

The company isn't just about reading; it offers a platform for creators to dive into comic-making through its inviting "Become a creator" program. They aim to transform the landscape of comics and provide an engaging experience anytime, anywhere.

You can check them out here: [Shortbread Website](https://www.shortbreadapp.com/) and download the app from the App Store, making binge-reading more convenient than ever.

In a world starved for quality entertainment, Shortbread is uniquely positioned to provide fun, accessible, and creative storytelling, catering to an audience craving romance, adventure, and a little bit of comic magic.
